respStmt.resp: Conversion from Juxta comparison set to TEI-conformant markup
respStmt.name: Generated by Juxta Commons

body.p:
Malcolm Lowry
Not much to remember
going to see the soused writer and
bursting
from with dull green wood
out to the live green water
with introductions and awkward
handshakes milkshakes
on a shore full of driftwood and
stones with
blue
boats stone
boars on a blue horizon
not seeming to move but moving anyway and ourselves
unaquainted with one another
unnoticed by the
sea
And seagulls
Hark, in the nature of things I shouldn't
have been surprised if there hadn't
been any gin that day
and getting drunk on
mushroom tea
